pages.text: Cocker Spaniels are small dogs that were originally bred for bird hunting.$(br2)Standing at just over half a block tall, these hardy little dogs come in five different coats.
These little dogs are most commonly found in various forest biomes. They can also be found in plains biomes, and more rarely in meadows.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Chicken Treat.
